official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to Marcus Garvey.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) Marcus Garvey, founder of the Universal Negro Improvement Association, was innocent of the charges brought against him by the U.S. government; (2) Garvey was and should be recognized internationally as a leader and thinker in the struggle for human rights; and (3) the President should take appropriate measures to clear Garvey's name.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to Marcus Garvey.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to Marcus Garvey.
